Reviews.Content: staying in Relais Florence I've stayed in Relays Florence during June. Overall the stay was okay but there were some problems that overshadowed the stay.The good things first:The owner was nice and helped us plan the tour in flourence and outside it. The location of the hotel was satisfying, we could visit the big attractions by foot. The not so good things are:We've received a room that is exactly above a bus station, so it as very loud when we opened the window. The owner didn't want us to use air conditioner, unless we pay him extra. The breakfast included two brioches that the owner put in our room a day before and coffee from a machine in the living room. I wouldn't call it a real breakfast. I hope my comment would help you decide properly to choose or not to choose staying in Relais Florence.
Reviews.Author: greenrosa

Reviews.Content: Stay Away from Relais Florence       Rat feces inthe bathroom
Reviews.Author: pogoeleven

Reviews.Content: loved the bed and breakfast i have just stayed all over italy and this bb was definately the best. I still cant believe the value for money. Leonardo the host was just wonderful, and as a single female traveler it was so nice to come back to a safe clean room and a friendly face. Leo was more than helpful when it came to giving me directions or sugestion of thing to do. I would definately stay here again when im in florence next and would recomend this place to anyone staying in Florence. the location was unbeatable.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
